Rome in her fruits being a sermon preached on the fifth of November, 1662, near to the standard in Cheapside : in the which sermon the author sets up his standard in opposition to the fruits and practices of Rome, and likewise answers in brief a late pamphlet, entitled Reasons why Roman Catholicks should not be pe[r]s[e]cuted / by Richard Carpenter. Carpenter, Richard, d. 1670?
[4], 32 p.
Printed by T. Ratcliffe, for H.R. ..., London : 1663.
Reproduction of original in Union Theological Seminary Library, New York.
=======
